name: @wontlost-ltd/aster-lang
description: A pragmatic, safe, fast language with human-readable CNL syntax that compiles to JVM bytecode

scripts.test: npm run fmt:examples && npm run build && npm run test:golden && npm run test:property
scripts.test:golden: npm run fmt:examples && npm run build && node dist/scripts/golden.js
scripts.test:golden:update: npm run build && node dist/scripts/cli.js cnl/examples/greet.cnl > cnl/examples/expected_greet.ast.json && node dist/scripts/cli.js cnl/examples/login.cnl > cnl/examples/expected_login.ast.json && node dist/scripts/emit-core.js cnl/examples/greet.cnl > cnl/examples/expected_greet_core.json && node dist/scripts/emit-core.js cnl/examples/login.cnl > cnl/examples/expected_login_core.json
scripts.examples:cleanup: npm run build && node dist/scripts/cleanup-examples.js && node dist/scripts/format-examples.js --write
scripts.ci: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run test:lsp && npm run build && npm run fmt:examples && npm run fmt:examples:check && npm run perf:lsp && npm run perf:lsp:assert && (node dist/scripts/lsp-smoke.js || echo 'lsp-smoke non-blocking') && (([ -n "$CI_DEBUG" ] && node dist/scripts/lsp-codeaction-smoke.js --debug || node dist/scripts/lsp-codeaction-smoke.js) || echo 'lsp-codeaction-smoke non-blocking') && (([ -n "$CI_DEBUG" ] && node dist/scripts/lsp-capmanifest-codeaction-smoke.js --debug || node dist/scripts/lsp-capmanifest-codeaction-smoke.js) || echo 'lsp-capmanifest-codeaction-smoke non-blocking') && npm run emit:class cnl/examples/greet.cnl && npm run javap:verify && npm run determinism:asm && npm run verify:asm:assert:listget && npm run verify:asm:interop && npm run verify:asm:sum && npm run verify:asm:intmatch && npm run verify:asm:intmatch:default && npm run verify:asm:classes && npm run verify:examples && ((npm run verify:asm:nullstrict) || echo 'nullstrict non-blocking') && ((npm run verify:asm:fuzz) || echo 'fuzz verify non-blocking') && ((npm run verify:truffle:smoke) || echo 'truffle smoke non-blocking') && ((npm run native:hello:lenient) || echo 'native non-blocking') && npm run docs:api && npm run docs:build
scripts.verify:asm: npm run build && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js cnl/examples/login.cnl && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js cnl/examples/greet.cnl && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js cnl/examples/enum_exhaustiveness.cnl && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js cnl/examples/match_enum.cnl && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js cnl/examples/result_trycatch.cnl && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js cnl/examples/list_ops.cnl && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js cnl/examples/map_ops.cnl && npm run javap:verify
scripts.verify:asm:intmatch:default:scan: npm run build && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js cnl/examples/int_match_default.cnl && node dist/scripts/javap-scan-intmatch-default.js
scripts.verify:asm:intmatch:default:scan:full: npm run build && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js cnl/examples/int_match_default.cnl && node dist/scripts/javap-scan-intmatch-default.js --full
scripts.verify:asm:trycatch: npm run build && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js cnl/examples/result_trycatch.cnl || echo 'trycatch emission failed (known issue, tracked)'; npm run javap:verify
scripts.verify:asm:lambda: npm run build && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles-core.js cnl/examples/lambda_stub_core.json && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles-core.js cnl/examples/lambda_call_core.json && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles-core.js cnl/examples/lambda_capture_core.json && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles-core.js cnl/examples/lambda_fn0_core.json && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles-core.js cnl/examples/lambda_concat_capture_core.json && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles-core.js cnl/examples/lambda_int_call_core.json && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles-core.js cnl/examples/nested_lambda_core.json && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles-core.js cnl/examples/nested_lambda_deep_core.json && npm run javap:verify
scripts.verify:asm:lambda:cnl: npm run build && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js cnl/examples/lambda_cnl.cnl && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js cnl/examples/lambda_cnl_short.cnl && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js cnl/examples/lambda_cnl_math_bool.cnl && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js cnl/examples/lambda_cnl_mixed.cnl && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js cnl/examples/lambda_cnl_match_bind.cnl && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js cnl/examples/lambda_cnl_match_result.cnl && node dist/scripts/emit-classfiles.js cnl/examples/lambda_cnl_match_maybe.cnl && npm run javap:verify
scripts.login:jar: npm run emit:class cnl/examples/login.cnl && npm run jar:jvm
scripts.login:native: npm run emit:class cnl/examples/login.cnl && npm run jar:jvm && ./gradlew :examples:login-native:nativeCompile
scripts.text:jar: node dist/scripts/emit-jvm.js cnl/examples/text_ops.cnl && npm run javac:jvm && npm run jar:jvm
scripts.cli:jar: npm run emit:class cnl/examples/cli_tool.cnl && npm run jar:jvm
scripts.list:jar: npm run emit:class cnl/examples/list_ops.cnl && npm run jar:jvm
scripts.map:jar: npm run emit:class cnl/examples/map_ops.cnl && npm run jar:jvm
scripts.rest:jar: npm run emit:class cnl/examples/rest_service.cnl && npm run jar:jvm
scripts.truffle:run:core: npm run build && node dist/scripts/emit-core.js cnl/examples/greet.cnl > build/greet_core.json && ./gradlew :truffle:run --args=build/greet_core.json
scripts.truffle:run:ifparam: npm run build && node dist/scripts/emit-core.js cnl/examples/if_param.cnl > build/if_param_core.json && ./gradlew :truffle:run --args="build/if_param_core.json true"
scripts.verify:truffle:smoke:java: npm run truffle:smoke:nested:java && npm run truffle:smoke:nested:deep:java && npm run truffle:smoke:lambda:java && npm run truffle:smoke:lambda:deep:java
scripts.verify:truffle:smoke: npm run truffle:smoke:nested && npm run truffle:smoke:nested:deep && npm run truffle:smoke:lambda && npm run truffle:smoke:lambda:deep
scripts.typecheck:demo:bad-generic: npm run build && node dist/scripts/typecheck-cli.js cnl/examples/bad_generic.cnl
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run ci
scripts.docs:all: npm run docs:api && npm run docs:build
scripts.ci:strict: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && npm run emit:class cnl/examples/greet.cnl && npm run javap:verify && npm run determinism:asm && npm run verify:asm:assert:listget && npm run verify:asm:interop && npm run verify:asm:classes && npm run docs:api && npm run docs:build
